description:
Soramachi Haru has dreamed of becoming one of the first-ever space fisherwomen, so that she can feed her beloved grandma her favorite sushi dishes. But she never expected it to go like this!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je vais attraper des poissons dans l`espace !
宇宙でサカナをとっちゃうぞ!
